text: The Crossroads League is a American college athletic conference. It is affiliated with the NAIA. The Schools In The Conference Are: * Marian (Knights) * Indiana Wesleyan (Wildcats) * Mount Vernon Nazarene (Cougars) * Spring Arbor (Cougars) * Bethel (Pilots) * Taylor (Trojans) * Saint Francis (Cougars) * Grace (Lancers) * Huntington (Foresters) * Goshen (Maple Leaves) Category:College athletics conferences
title: Crossroads League
